short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click access to protected resources from off-campus with your GMU credentials.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extension to give users with George Mason University credentials quick and easy access to protected resources (e.g., journals) when off campus. When viewing a protected resource, click the extension button to log in and quickly open the resource.
